pr_title: KEYCLOAK-10898 WildFly Adapter CLI based installation scripts

timeline.message: KEYCLOAK-10898 WildFly Adapter CLI based installation scripts

timeline.bodyText: deploymentName should have quotes around it, otherwise spaces are lost and it becomes "WARMODULENAME.war" in standalone.xml.
timeline.author: stianst

timeline.bodyText: Use quotes instead of _ to make it consistent with XML download.
timeline.author: stianst

timeline.bodyText: Use quotes instead of _ to make it consistent with XML download.
timeline.author: stianst

timeline.bodyText: Use quotes instead of _ to make it consistent with XML download.
timeline.author: stianst

timeline.bodyText: Use quotes instead of _ to make it consistent with XML download.
timeline.author: stianst

timeline.bodyText: Use quotes instead of _ to make it consistent with XML download.
timeline.author: stianst

timeline.message: KEYCLOAK-10898 WildFly Adapter CLI based installation scripts

timeline.bodyText:
introduce a method for escaping the quotes in any user-entered data: https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_jboss_enterprise_application_platform/7.1/html-single/management_cli_guide/index#quotation_marks

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            .append("/subsystem=keycloak/secure-deployment=\"").append(deploymentName).append("\"/:add( \\\n")
          
          
            
                            .append("/subsystem=keycloak/secure-deployment=\"").append(quote(deploymentName)).append("\"/:add( \\\n")
timeline.author: hmlnarik

timeline.message: KEYCLOAK-10898 WildFly Adapter CLI based installation scripts

timeline.bodyText: The value has to be quoted per https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_jboss_enterprise_application_platform/7.2/html-single/management_cli_guide/index#cli_special_characters
timeline.author: hmlnarik
